Gulp SVG Sprites (24 icons in <symbol> mode)

Files Generated:

  1. svg/symbols.svg

Usage:

  1. Include the contents of the SVG file just after the opening <body> tag.
  2. Paste one of the snippets anywhere into your website.

  • icon-chevron-thin-left


    <svg class="icon icon-chevron-thin-left"><use xlink:href="#icon-chevron-thin-left"></use></svg>
